website_summaries.verdict: The Asics GT 1000 4 was a reliable stability shoe for many runners. Many stated that they were able to feel the mid-foot support unit as it stabilized their gait. It’s even adequately lightweight, allowing them to use it for their daily running sessions of the pavement. On the other hand, there were those who commented that the durability of this shoe wasn’t on point. The cushioning system left a lot to be desired for a number of consumers, as well.
pros: The cloth-like disposition of the upper unit allowed the foot to move naturally, according to some runners
The vibrant color options were appreciated by many
The toe box received some recognition from testers who felt that it was wide enough to accommodate natural toe-splaying
‘Comfortable’ was a word that’s frequently used by users to define their running sessions while wearing this shoe
The Gel® Cushioning System gained renown among testers because it responsibly delivered cushioning and shock absorption
The mid-foot stability unit was able to correct over-pronated foot motion, wrote a number of testers who needed pronation control
A runner was pleased that it was versatile
it worked well for moderate distance running and trainings
A great number of consumers were impressed by its lightweight nature, saying that they didn’t feel as if the shoe dragged them down
A number of testers commented that the outsole’s traction capability was reliable
cons: The toes of some testers tended to hit the upper fabrics frequently, causing holes to form on the shoe’s façade
The rubber material on the bottom started to peel off on some runners, significantly reducing traction
Several runners noted that this shoe wasn’t very comfortable for their feet
they claimed to experience discomfort in their heels and knees while wearing it

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. A perfect blend of mild support and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. A perfect blend of mild support and flexibility. The cloth upper and somewhat wide toe box allows for one's foot to move naturally. The sole is a little rigid at first but it loosens quickly. The cushioning is great for any kind of run. They look great, both stylish and functional. Extremely comfortable. My wife and I both own a pair, she over pronates and I don't. These shoes work perfectly for both of us. If there were downsides to this shoes I would list them but as far as I can tell, there aren't. I love that Asics still makes all black shoes, it is hard to find nice looking all black, quality running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: B1984

customer_reviews.title: ... third pair of GT1000 sneakers and they are simply wonderful. I struggled trying to find true wide width ...
customer_reviews.text: This is now my third pair of GT1000 sneakers and they are simply wonderful. I struggled trying to find true wide width sneakers for years until the GT line came out and now I wont buy anything else. The 13 4E fits me like it was made for me and I can walk in them all day long with no hot spots or calluses. On top of this, they look great and are reasonable in price! If you have wide, large, flat feet like me....do yourself a favor and try a pair.
customer_reviews.author: 762x51

customer_reviews.title: Great value and support
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shoe for $40. I compared this with some other inexpensive Asics, and this pair won hands down. The gt 1000 4 has the support of a $70 shoe. The trail shoes for not have near enough cushion or support. Highly recommended! I also have the gt 2000 6, and was surprised how close this gt 1000 is. It is not as good as the 2ks, but very close.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stoke

customer_reviews.title: Solid successor to the GEL-1160 and GEL-1170 models
customer_reviews.text: I have been treadmill running and walking with the Asics GEL-1160 and GEL-1170 models for several years, but since they have discontinued that line, this is the successor and it feels exactly the same to me out of the box. I have a pretty narrow size 13 foot, and this shoe and its predecessors have always fit nicely. This is marketed as a sort of "middle of the road" shoe - not particularly geared toward under- or over-pronated gaits. My Asics shoes have held up really well over the years, and I typically wear them well beyond the 300 - 600 mile recommendation for running shoe life, probably in part because my treadmill has some shock absorption.
customer_reviews.author: B. Franklin "Justin"

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a black pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got the black because it's my favorite color and I wanted something that wouldn't look dirty after 3 weeks from work.. They are really nice and stealthy looking. Few things to keep in mind. These are really size 10 (even though the label says otherwise). I have Adidas and New Balance to compare sizing to. I've found it's best not to pull the laces before tying as it makes them almost too snug. I used to wear wide, but was finding the sides were choking my foot. I slipped these babies on and haven't had foot pain. Even though these have gel inside, get some gel inserts. The extra gel really helps with standing all day in retail.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 1/2 medium but find it difficult to fit into sports shoes especially Nike. I usually order a 10 so it will fit me especially in the width but many times find the shoe a little to tight anyway. Could be that I like a little extra room in my shoes instead of fitting like a glove. Thought I would try Asics because of the wide widths. Therefore I ordered a 10 2E and it fit great with a little spare room. Maybe a 9 1/2 2E would have fit great too but I'm satisfied with these. No problem wearing inserts with these shoes. They are very comfortable with no break in time.
customer_reviews.author: JacTrac

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe in size 16 4E,
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who wears size 16 4E, ASICS makes several running shoes in size 16 4E that are well made and comfortable. Great team work using Amazon Prime with delivery usually in two days, it just takes a few minutes to find what I want and order it instead of running all around town looking for size 16, most stores do not carry anything larger than 13 and ASICS has great designs and performance. Better yet they were on sale and I got an even better price. Score one for ASICS and Amazon ..
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W75

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for my long wide feet. (Size 14, 4E). They require a couple of days of breaking in until they're totally comfortable, but that's not uncommon for new shoes. After that, they're very comfortable in length, width and height, and the insole is very supportive. With most of my previous shoes, I needed to purchase higher end aftermarket insoles with good support. With these shoes, the support is as good as having quality aftermarket insoles. This is my second pair of the GT 1000 4, and I had a pair of the GT 1000 3 prior to that.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: - Recommend to anyone with similar foot problems as myself
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes in hopes they would help stabilize the midtarsal joint in my left foot (I added a photo to illustrate what type of motion the midtarsal joint enables). I'm 30 years old. 6' tall and 187 pounds. I have arthritis in my feet and ankles due to foot trama from when I was 18. I've been wearing these shoes for a few weeks now and have experienced a significant reduction in pain compared to my previous pair of shoes. - I would buy again. - Recommend to anyone with similar foot problems as myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of ASICS shoes and these didn't disappoint. I use them for a variety of activities including biking, walking and general exercise. Aside from being stylish, these are comfortable, provide a secure fit, and give me proper support where I need it. They also don't seem to wear on my joints as the day goes on. I could use these for general all purpose wear, but I wanted a set devoted solely to exercise. Overall, I'd definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take Care of your FEET
customer_reviews.text: I wear GT series shoes for over pronation due to a TKR. I have high instep but low arch and they provide excellent support to my condition. I would recommend Asics GT series to anyone with over pronation or flat feet. The are very comfortable and very supportive. Asics is one of few companies that really focus on the care of your feet and then today's styles. GREAT SHOE and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T

customer_reviews.title: Good versatile athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of ASICS GT1000's, and I really like them. I find them to be all-day comfortable and versatile shoes. They are billed as running shoes but I use them as cross trainers - for walking, aerobics, P90X, weight training and elliptical workouts. They do have arch support which would probably be adequate for people with arches but on advice of my PT I add a thin, full length arch support (orthotic) under all my shoes' insoles to keep my feet happy. Note: As most people do I go up a half size when purchasing shoes to accommodate my orthotics. For example if you are a 10.5 normally, buy an 11 if you're adding an orthotic.
customer_reviews.author: BoKat76

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from a heavy guy.
customer_reviews.text: Actually one of the great running shoe series. This shoe lives up to shoe series hype, and the sole of the feet is very cushy so when I do intensive workouts or running (I'm a heavy guy) and it absorbs a lot of the shock and it's easy on my knees. And from the looks it's very appealing. I've had this product for approximately over 6 months and use this for lifting weights and running off and on. I feel like it's better than running gt 5. Pros: Looks nice Absorbs shock from running and intensive workouts. Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Pleione

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I like to run 2-3 miles as often as I can. These provide excellent support and great cushion while running on cement and the treadmill. No complaints here. I am 6'2" tall athletic build and have had arthroscopic knee surgery on both of my knees, and these work great. I have worn Reeboks as well, but in the present I am unable to find some that provide the cushion I am looking for so I gave these a shot and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: leo campbell

customer_reviews.title: I recommend ordering half a size larger than you normal size ...
customer_reviews.text: I recommend ordering half a size larger than you normal size when it comes to Asic brand. These shoes are very light. I spend a lot of times on my feet, and these shoes are wonderful. I kind of wished they would put more padding in the sides and bottom of the shoes. I guess you can buy insoles to put in. The shoes look nice. Build quality is good, it's maintaing it's shape so far.
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe -- for the price, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: It's getting hard to find a decent shoe in all-black. Since I'm a soccer referee in California, I normally prefer a running shoe to a turf or cleated shoe for refereeing, since I rather infrequently encounter real issues with fields -- in the winter, high school soccer here is played mainly on artificial turf fields. At any rate, this shoe works perfectly for me -- good support and motion control, unobtrusive visually, and light enough to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: BSman

customer_reviews.title: They are ok, not the best option for joggin'...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. Althou, I still like my GT-2000 2 better than these. On this pair, the ankle support is a little weak. I don't feel my feet real tight in them. They are nice to walk, not so much to run. Usually, on my 5 mille run, I would get more tired with these than my GT-2000 2. But these GT-1000 4 look prettier... LOL
customer_reviews.author: Fer Quest

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and competent
customer_reviews.text: I've run hundreds of miles in Mizuno, Brooks, Asics, New Balance and other shoes. These have no distinguishing characteristics, but they are fine. The wide size is comfortable for me. Support is pretty good, but the platform does not feel too stiff. There's nothing that makes this "the" shoe for me, but as long as they are on sale, I'm happy to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and wore them for a 7 mile walk without any other use and they felt so good that I ordered another pair. I no longer run but do lots of cycling, both road and mountain with average rides 25 to 50 miles (alternating days long and short rides) and walking 6 to 7 miles daily. I use these shoes for walking and they are excellent. I would imagine they are excellent for those that run as the cushioning and support are superb. Very pleased with both the price and quality of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian_Canada

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: fit great and are really comfortable. I have bad feet and ankles from working construction my whole life and I used to always get foot pains after walking a while or stiff feet after sitting. After i bought my first pair a year ago my foot pain went away unless I walk several miles and no more stiff feet and ankles after sitting. I can walk much further than before and have no pain afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: JasonB

customer_reviews.title: Great arch suport!
customer_reviews.text: These are the 8th pair of these shoes that I've gotten for my husband. He has plantar fasciitis, but works on his feet for most of the day. The only reason we've bought so many of these is because his work gets them dirty and unsightly after a few months. They are then relegated to gym wear only where they last for another year. I have lots of these shoes in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: LeighAna

customer_reviews.title: Love Asics
customer_reviews.text: I really like these asics shoes. They fit great and have a lot of support. I wear them to work a lot. I work on concrete and they are holding up in the support area just fine. I am a true asics fan and try to have a couple of pair on hand to switch them out every so often. Good shoes and good support.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cox

customer_reviews.title: buy larger size than usual
customer_reviews.text: i usually wear 6 and a half 4E .I previously bought those b4 in asics and came up too small especially in the tongue top area. due to others saying the same thing ,this time i bought size 7 4e and they fit fine, arch support is very minimal tho. still a decent price, nice looking shoe. I go along with others and recommend you buy a half size larger than your normal size or you will be unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall these shoes are great. Ive been suffering from some injuries and chose these shoes because of their increased padding versus the minimal shoes I normally prefer. They provide a very smooth ride and fit my feet really well. My foot feels really secure in these shoes. Ive tried other brands that are supposed to be zero drop with padding but I much prefer these Asics.
customer_reviews.author: N.S. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worn out way too soon.
customer_reviews.text: I admit to being hard on shoes because I walk and ride as much as I can, but these literally were reduced to flat rubber in about 6-8 weeks. That is just way too short for what are supposed to be quality shoes. The upper part of the shoes are fine though. It's sad they seem to have more life in them, but were unwearable after a few weeks of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Flamo

customer_reviews.title: Well I have to say... completely shocked ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say... completely shocked at the inability to withstand basic wear n tear. Especially for the price!!!! I expected a sneaker that would have no problem standing up to frequent walks but that wasn't the case here. The shoes started to deteriorate less than a year after purchasing.. pieces of rubber just started peeling apart. I surely expected at least a year or more before having to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Dami

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the performance. Used them hiking in Arkansas Pinnacle Peak State park- pretty challenging terrain and running in Humidity of Florida gulf coast. The seem to breath well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ottoman

customer_reviews.title: These are surprisingly heavy for running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Considerably heavier than the New Balance running shoes I'm accustomed to. They feel rather clunky and awkward, although I'll probably adjust to them eventually. I've only done three 5 mile runs in them so far. The cushioning feels fairly comfortable, although I had some initial blistering on both heels. Hopefully they'll remain cushy for more than a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I simply love my ASICS that I bought two pairs of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I simply love my ASICS that I bought two pairs of the same ones. One lesson I learned when purchasing these shoes is that once you find something that fits you really well, go out and get a few more pairs to add to your inventory before they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good price and I know they are the best ones for my running gait already
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than if I go to the running shoe stores. That said, if you don't know exactly how you walk / run and which shoes are best for you than you should go to those stores and pay the extra money at least to buy and find out what the best shoes are for you. After that you can cheap out and buy the same / similar models online for a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: wlgh0016

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: really a nice shoe and I have so far put about 450 miles on them and they are still in really good condition. the only time I have not liked running in these is running on a resistance track. but for trails, gravel, or on the road I have had no issues. they are really comfortable and I have to say I hope they are still carried when it comes to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mason

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed.. lol Now on the item purchased
customer_reviews.text: First, I am a newbie with Amazon since Christmas. Each time I order, I am amazed..lol Now on the item purchased, I am a recreational runner, and have run a few 13.1 half marathons, I have been wearing asics for the past 4 or 5 years. The current model 1000 is the 5 series. They run about 100.00 retail. For the price of these 4 series, awesome. Knowing the quality and fit of the asics, this is a no brainer. A great deal and, shipping always as promised. A+ as usual.
customer_reviews.author: ThatVintageDude06

customer_reviews.title: Great support and versatility not to mention good weight
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of leg issues, I buy a new pair of this shoe every year for almost ten years. If that doesn’t say I stand by it I dunno what will. Great support and versatility not to mention good weight. Obviously not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Joe Arleth

customer_reviews.title: Not Brand new
customer_reviews.text: Ive have had these shoes before and love them. But for this particular order the seller sent me one brand new shoe and one used but new shoe, it looks like one shoe was used as display/ test shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes especially for those with foot pain
customer_reviews.text: The Asics GT 1000 series are the best running shoes and walking shoes I have ever used. This plus a pair of sofsole high arch insoles completely cured my plantar fasciitis that I have struggled with my whole life. I have tried many expensive insoles and shoes and nothing compares to these. I think the gods I came across these and the sofsole high arch insoles
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Candy

customer_reviews.title: Shoe review for my crew
customer_reviews.text: As far as running shoes go, these have been pretty good to me. The heel portion responds very well and stability is superb for me, as I tend to overpronate my feet. The mesh upper, however, is porous enough to let morning dew through the shoe which resulted in me having wet socks. Given the fact that I plan to run in most types of weather, ending with soaking wet feet is not coolio, but they're awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased these shoes twice for my husband because he loved the first pair so much
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes twice for my husband because he loved the first pair so much. He is on his feet all day (working at the airport) and provisioning planes for the airlines, mostly working 16 hour shifts. These are absolutely his faves. I've tried almost every name brand and this is the one I will always come back to!! They fit perfect and he states that they provide excellent arch support. You will love them too!
customer_reviews.author: beckynava

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: These Asics are very wearable, comfortable, have very nice grip and tread, and very durable. I used them delivering mail, hustling around the city, hiking, and all around everywhere. They've held up an entire year of hard core use before the tread began showing it's age, yet they're still so comfortable and every other part of the shoe looks nearly brand new! How do they do it? I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Always a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering these shoes for over a year now. They have a nice and roomy toe box, which I prefer. They last me around 500-600 miles before I buy a new pair, however, aesthetically they still look almost-new at this point. Priced anywhere between $60-$80 they are definitely worth it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe with a bit of a durability issue
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very comfortable. Great fitting shoe with excellent arch support - for a while. My main complaint with this model is that the insides do break down pretty quickly. Will keep buying them until I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: 2muchTV

customer_reviews.title: Cheep and it tells, Asics still greath though!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed in this shoe as it seems to be falling apart very fast and not as comfortable as other Asics I have gotten, this wont stop me from getting another Asic shoe but this particular one is a bit on the cheep side and id recommend spending a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: M Carolin

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good fit, a bit heavy but comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the. The item was marked as Prime, however it arrived one day late and changed carriers to USPS along the way. The shoe however was a good fit for me since my toes run a little wide. When measuring I think I run a 2E, but the 4E was comfortable and not much wider. I run with the Saucony Grid Excursion TR6, which feel like feathers on your feet. These shoes are heavier compared to that. Overall though, it is comfortable and a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Get a pair while you can.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not readily available in stores having been replaced by newer models. It is the most comfortable of all the Asics that I wear. I just ordered another pair days after this pair arrived. Two more aging pairs in my closet. This model meets all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: wallace cranford

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for running
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shoe and it’s all previous versions. Fits as described. It’s great for running. I tried this model first time in store then I’ve been buying online. I don’t know if anyone should buy just based on the reviews. you got to try it somewhere
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I liked the shoe outside the toe box and Amazon did ...
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is too narrow, it caused nail issues and discomfort, I had to purchase a different style looking for a solution to the narrow box. I liked the shoe outside the toe box and Amazon did not have the 2E in my size so I could not try to buy these in a wider selection.
customer_reviews.author: s0der

customer_reviews.title: fit great. Usually wear 9 1/2 to 10 D
customer_reviews.text: Had ASICS previously, ordered shoes same size as previous, fit great. Usually wear 9 1/2 to 10 D, but because ASICS tend to be narrow and shorter, I have to order 11 4E. Also note the cleaning instructions, don't clean in washing machine, sole sections tend to separate with repeated washings. (the separations occured after about three years) Will update star rating at a later
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Bruker

customer_reviews.title: My loud-color-averse son loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 15 yr old son. He likes Asics GT shoes. They're comfortable right out of the box. He is starting to run more, so the fit is so important. Great looking shoes, too. He doesn't like super flashy or loud colors. He's very happy with this pair in dark gray with just a bit of dark red.
customer_reviews.author: SB Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: Asics make the widest shoe that I have found so far. I have a very wide foot and have tried every brand that offers an extra-wide running shoe. Asics are simply the best for my really wide feet. I have also found that they wear well and last much longer than other brands without loosing their shape or rolling over the sole. They run true to size. Overall, they offer excellent fit and performance at a fair price. That makes them a great deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've ever owned. Podiatrist recommended ASICS and another brand, but after reading reviews on Amazon, I had to give them a try. They have great heal support and really cradle my heal to keep it in a neutral position. They are light and not heavy and weigh your feet down. I'll definently buy another pair when these need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Black

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My kid liked this one before so reordered this time with larger size. However a teenage changes taste as fast as they grow. This time another style was favored. This one wil be returned. Nothing with the build and quality. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Fits as expected. I was looking for black running shoes with good support and I'm glad I found these. Even though they are guy shoes, people still compliment them on me. So they could be for women and men. I have flat feet and these have good support without being too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: these are comfortable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: As a midfoot strike runner with flat feet, these are comfortable, lightweight, and eliminated the pain caused by a New Balance running shoe I was using (which wasn't optimized for maximum arch support). This ASICS has excellent arch support, just right comfort (not too tight & not too loose), and the black color goes with virtually any colored gym clothes you have. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: accordboy23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe, I'm a driver for UPS and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe, I'm a driver for UPS and I put in 7-8 miles daily, I also squat 225 once a week, it's my full time and OT tenis shoe, I didn't wear out the threading but the cushioning got smashed with so much pounding, for my taste is no longer good, so after 4 months got a second pair, no regrets just too much work on them but love them so much it's worthed, I used to used the brand w the swoosh, no comparison quality and durability ASICS all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, not super for driving.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, fit well, good grip, comfortable even for a large footed person (14). my only complaint is that they kind of stink for driving, theres a groove running along the bottom that the pedals get stuck in, and if you have to hold your foot on the brake for a long time it get annoying and uncomfortable, but other than that they seem great so far.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: These shoes will go anywhere and do anything with you!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes! I go running, I go to class, I forget to take them off and then fall asleep in them, they are that good! Much cheaper than other running shoes, for arguably better quality! I think I will have to get another pair soon, because I would like to have a pair that don't smell like my feet after exercising for an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Beyer

customer_reviews.title: fit tight at first, give them a few runs tho
customer_reviews.text: Good running shoes for myself, I can;t say I am a frequent or professional runner, I literally got theses just so I could start running more often. When I received them, I felt they were a bit tight up front, but as I have been running in them they seem to have adjusted and don;t give me any discomfort, I can wear them all day and get good support. The colors are nice and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: They're good stability shoes but definitely on the heavy end
customer_reviews.text: They're good stability shoes but definitely on the heavy end. If you're not a super fast runner these are a great product. I would move away from these shoe types if you are a highly efficient runner because they're a relatively stiff shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Asics shoes for my husband for Christmas and he loves the way they feel on his feet. They fit as expected, are very comfortable when running, and the overall design (color combination) is sophisticated and discreet, which he tends to prefer. We always buy Asics and can totally recommend them especially if you have wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice shoe, I've bought the GT 1000 line for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shoe, I've bought the GT 1000 line for several years now as a good all-purpose shoe that's not out-of-place in an office due to the color. That said, the durability is only OK, and is easily the worst aspect of this shoe. I regularly have to buy a new pair every year, but these days I guess that's expected for an every-day usage shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Donaldsky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable. I ordered a 4E, but could have got by with a 2E width. I"m normally a 10 and a half and these shoes are an 11, so I would say that these shoes are a little smaller (half size) than a Nike or Adidas. Use these on the treadmill and the elliptical and my feet are fine with the support they have.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: wide feet!!
customer_reviews.text: i have extremely wide feet. i normally buy the brand drew and get their widest, 6e. i was on the fence about buying these because i wasnt sure if 4e would be wide enough. im glad i took the plunge, these fit!! sooo if you have extremely wide feet then id recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: makayla

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found my exact size: 7 2E ......Love them...I wear no shoes like these never before....They fit as a Glove and after walking with them for about 9 hours in a row and on pavement I still don't feel them.....I'll buy more pairs In different colors....Hopefully I'll be able to get them since my size is really hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cobos

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I went and tried on the shoe at Academy before purchasing so I knew my shoe size would be a great fit. I did order a half size (12.5) which of course is a unique size to find at a store, so the feeling is great. This is my first pair of asics. After being highly encouraged to try them from several co-workers, I am very pleased. The cushioning is phenomenon and I noticed improvement almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Good support for my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I've only run in them twice so far. I tried on the same type of show in a store and the size 9 was too big, but the 8.5 is almost too small. Good support for my flat feet, but consider sticking to running flat ground -- I ran a trail today and could tell that there was less lateral support in these shoes than my previous ones, as well as less strength over the toe for kicking aside branches that fell across the path.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart J Daman

customer_reviews.title: Great with shorts
customer_reviews.text: My go-to everyday shoes. I walk 10k steps per day religiously, so I replace these at least 2-3 times per year and I always get the same shoe.Great with shorts, jeans, even dark casual pants, and you can get away with wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: and these did not disappoint. Plus the shoe laces are extra long to ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfy. Wore them on a 4 mile walk, and then for the rest of the day, right out of the box. I have had Asics shoes before, so I knew what to expect, and these did not disappoint. Plus the shoe laces are extra long to feed through the back holes and still double knot the bow with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda M. Talbutt

customer_reviews.title: Great Stealth Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday walking-jogging-trail shoe. Not the first time buying this model (actually bought 2 pair this time as they were on sale). I'm between a 12 and 13 but always order 13. These fit perfect which means if your are in between sizes order up 1/2 to the next size. All black, so I can wear to work without telegraphing I'm wearing running shoes. These are normal D width, but I don't need a wide shoe, as I have a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I expect it to be fine once broke in but this is the 1st time ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected but for the first time with a pair of Asics I have an unusual uncomfortable feeling in my big toe with the right shoe. I expect it to be fine once broke in but this is the 1st time Ive put on Asics and they didn't feel completely comfortable right away.
customer_reviews.author: Henny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as always no complasints
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as always no complasints. If you could ship politicians like you do other items things would really go well. Thanks again. PS. I almost got them thru Zappos on your site but couldn't figure how to use Amazon gift card with them. Maybe I can't. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E.  Svendbye

customer_reviews.title: Well built shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well cushioned for working on my feet for 14 hours a night. Sturdy but comfortable. Easily cleaned. I have wide feet and they fit well. I do order a 1/2 size larger than Nike or New Balance. (9 vs 8.5)
customer_reviews.author: Summersvet

customer_reviews.title: Used by professional Stuntmen
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional stuntman and I am glad I found these shoes! I was looking for all black shoes with black soles (since I can wear them during stunts and the camera can't tell the difference). These last longer than my previous sneakers, and are very comfortable! Definitely feel a little bouncy
customer_reviews.author: Rustic Bodomov

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort
customer_reviews.text: Wow these things feel amazing. Very nicely made and NOTHING on the them feels cheap. My first thoughts were, wow the aware made nicely. The comfort was very impressive too. When I tried them on I already knew they were the most comfortable shoe I had ever worn. I would highly recommend them. I purchased for 90$ but I would pay 120$ for these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden Blanton

customer_reviews.title: No store anywhere had anything like this, or only had one "Rainbow vomit" color ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a very very specific shoe for work. It had to be black and i have wide feet. No store anywhere had anything like this, or only had one "Rainbow vomit" color for the size in wide. This fit my unique feet great and can stand in them for 8 hour shifts without any pain, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: I'm a U. S. Army Soldier and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a U.S. Army Soldier and have worn this model of Asics for almost ten years now. I've tried all the other brands and keep coming back to these. I run and bike and average of three miles five days a week with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: I musta just bought this for the wrong reason but ...
customer_reviews.text: I musta just bought this for the wrong reason but I just couldn't have. I have a job where I am always on my feet walking around on carpet, tile, and concrete and they didn't even last a year. Comfy and light weight though!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of size 12 - 3E sneakers that I am currently using. I ordered these ASICS in size 12.5 - 4E, and while the length was ok, the width was considerably more narrow than my pair of 3E sneakers. Although my 3E sneakers are obviously broken in from use, they were still more wide when they were brand new than these ASICS are.
customer_reviews.author: Ryethiel

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes. Order 1 size larger than your normal foot size.
customer_reviews.text: As usual, ASICS shoes run small, so I ordered a size 10 for my size 9 to 9 1/2 size feet and they fit perfectly. Nice and light, comfortable, and look good for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: GrampaGary

customer_reviews.title: Felt like I was wearing someone else's work boots
customer_reviews.text: Toe box way too wide. Felt like I was wearing someone else's work boots. Ten minutes and back in the box for a return. Everyone who wears Asics says they love them and have had several pairs, so maybe this was an isolated incident. Looked very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a 10 year old pair of NBs that served me well. Kept the NBs that long for many reasons, but the two main ones were the fact that I am cheap and the shoes fit well. These Asics fit very well also. My feet are on the wide side, but generally find the EEs too big and the normal width too small. The width of these works well. I have only had these two weeks, but have used them each day and really like them so far. My use to date has been daily workouts and 20 minute runs on the treadmill. Overall, a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cant say for sure... but these ...
customer_reviews.text: I cant say for sure...but these may be from China....the shoe strings never stay tied...Inside the shoe both heels. the cloth has a large hole in it.I have owned Asics for years and years...there is just some thing different about this shoe that makes it suspect
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sneakers I Have Owned
customer_reviews.text: These are THE most comfortable sneakers I have ever worn! I have owned a lot of Nikes and they do not even come close to the comfort of these sneakers. The 2E was just perfect for my foot. Also the black shoes are really nice and clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Couple of designs were out of luck
customer_reviews.text: The hindfoot is much lower than the forefoot. Not sure why. Doesn't work for my foot. The insole doesn't work in these.
customer_reviews.author: David Yakub

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: Had these in white for wearing out and about. I just bought these in black to wear with work clothes. They are super comfortable and have been asked by coworkers where I got them as they too were interested in being more comfortable, even when wearing dress pants and a collared shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes especially if you need support for either under ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes especially if you need support for either under or over pronation. Before I switched to the GT-1000 I ran on shoes that had no support and was getting terrible shin splints but since I have switched if I had no longer had those problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Support have bad location
customer_reviews.text: Support for this shoes is before the arch then I think so in some cases is going to work, in my case don't work nothing,
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo garcia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking. I ordered my usual size 10 4E and they fit fine. I wear mainly for my daily walks and when I'm just going out and they're very comfortable. Amazon suggested a smaller size but glad I ordered my regular size. Price was great and as prime member shipping was 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-NJ

customer_reviews.title: ouch ouch !
customer_reviews.text: narrower in the toe than their other 4E sneakers sorta have a plasticy look to them. other than that they're okay
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: It's been over two years now and I totally love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I wanted to buy a pair of shoes, running shoes no less online. It's been over two years now and I totally love these shoes. They are lightweight, comfortable and appear to be very well made. I run on a daily basis and sometimes I wear them to work... very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. Goethe

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I can run and my feet don't hurt.
customer_reviews.text: Title pretty much says it all. I bought a prior version of the GT 1000 almost two years ago. After wearing them pretty much every day, they have held up pretty well. I want to wear these things all the time. However the fabric on top was looking rough and the design was not attractive to begin with. I got the black version of the GT 1000 4 to replace the old pair, and I find the look more understated and appropriate in a wider variety of contexts. And just as comfortable as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: As with all my shoes, use with Superfeet or ...
customer_reviews.text: As with all my shoes, use with Superfeet or cheap imitation thereof. With age my arches have fallen any my feet (and every other part of my anatomy has gained girth. Replaced all my D widths with EE widths. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: P. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Carry on the old GT series.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. The technical successor to the popular Asics GT-2100 series shoe. I ran in Asics since the inception of the GT series and these shoes carry the supportive structure well. I have been running since 1966 and these shoes are keeping me on the streets. Buy 'em!
customer_reviews.author: JimNecci

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for my wide feet! Got so tired of boring new balance white and stiff outer shell. These help my overheated feet breathe. I use them exclusively for the elliptical and treadmill so I get really sweaty but my feet don't overheat! Highly recommend and wish i had discovered them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Brown Family

customer_reviews.title: They make my runs comfortable, they usually last me about six months when ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to shoes for PRT in the Army. They make my runs comfortable, they usually last me about six months when I do a lot of running, but I can still wear them for walking and what not.
customer_reviews.author: octavio trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes very much and wore them for my Cardiac Rehab program, a 3 month gym rehab program following open heart surgery. They are exactly what I needed, and I'll be wearing them for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Asics for a long time. They've never let me down. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: rkkiii

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for being on your feet all day!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Dad who works all day at a big box store and struggles to find shoes comfortable enough to walk the aisles (10 miles a day). In fairness, he tried these on at a sporting goods store, so we knew exactly what he needed before buying them here for 10% less. He is normally wears a full size smaller (an 11 in New Balance), but a 12 in these fits perfectly. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for feet that are wide at the toe.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are wide at the toe, so Asics are my go to brand of running shoe. These particular shoes are not top of the line, of course, but I like them for casual wear, walking, going to the store, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Asics girl in mens shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes Im a female who wears mens running shoes because they are so roomy and usually have killer support with a good toe box. Im a low mileage casual runner and these do help me with my overpronation and have a nice fit snug but not tight. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Novagyrl

customer_reviews.title: Asics are the only athletic shoes for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've actually been wearing this model and various upgrades of it for years now. Once you find something you like, it is hard to change. Asics are the only athletic shoes that work very well for me. I don't understand why that is, but glad I have access to them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great! Highly recommend, very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I hiked 10 miles in them the second day owning them and they felt great! I wear them every day at work now and walk on average 5 miles a day, I have been wearing Asics for a couple years now and absolutely love them! They are also spot on with the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Huneau

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gt-1000 5 Gr Ankle-High Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Whether youre walking jogging running working or relaxing you seem to find yourself continuously on your feet And with all that wear-and-tear you want to make certain that your feet dont let you down and wear you out in the process Thats where your Asics sports shoes come into play Their strategically engineered design that includes a patented rubber type sole with multiple numbers of foot enhancing and comforting supports assures you that no matter what the day throws at you that you can take it and keep going For the very best in sturdiness and wear-ability you simply cant beat this pair of Asics shoes Their incredible light-weight construction and mid-sole 150in platform make this pair of shoes the ultimate in both comfort and style Once you take your first step in these beauties you will instantly know that these are shortly going to be your go-to pair of sports shoes for all kinds of occasions These versatile and technically advanced shoes will allow you to glide painlessly and effortlessly over almost any terrain The outside pattern only adds to the excitement of what this Asics style of shoe can help you overcome as you travel all of lifes highways and by-ways in colorful style The shock-absorbing cushioning found inside each shoe will work small miracles in making your foot feel like a million bucks every time you slip these babies on and the fabric uppers performs wonderfully in wicking away moisture that might otherwise add to your discomfort Flexibility support and comfort all in one pair of shoes is what makes your pair of Asics shoes perfect for all your sports shoe requirements Quality manufacturing inspiring design and cut and the perfect answer to your specific needs makes these Asics shoes a competitive answer for any sports bid that you might have on your short list
feature_bullets: mpact Guidance System (I.G.S) (Running) : ASICS design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natural gait from heel strike to toe-off.
Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning Systems: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement on multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
SpEVA Midsole: Material Improves bounce-back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
DuoMax Support System: A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability.
Guidance Line:  Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.
